page.title: 17FOOTPATHS
page.content: The footpaths in Wembury are very {steep}in parts especially around HMS Cambridge. Our teacher took us for a walk around the{coastal footpath}by {Heybrook Bay}and{HMS Cambridge.}We had walked from the school across to Bovi- sand Lane along footpath no. 1.{When {we walked by HMS Cambridge we saw a } {piece of metal jutting out in the mid- {dle of the path.}So{Simon Merrill}wro- te to the Clerk to the{Parish Council to tell her about it. Mrs. Williams sent Simon's letter to the{South Devon {Heritage Coast Service}because the{ {Parish Council }are not responsible for the{coastal paths,only the inland {paths. The SDHSC}have now informed their Warden of the problem. In the grid area are these footpaths: 1-20, 22,30,and 31. The{Wembury Illustrated {Footpath Guidebook (published by the {Parish Council) gives full details.
